      • getVideoRecommendations

        public java.util.List<Video> getVideoRecommendations(java.lang.Integer userId,
                                            java.lang.Integer videoId,
                                            java.lang.String channel)
        Parameters:
        userId -
        videoId -
        channel -
        Returns:
        The getVideoRecommendations is the service where we can get some recommendations for a user. So if a user watches a video, or gets to a page with a video embded, we can call this service to get a list of recommendations. The implementation will then go directly to the RecommendationEgnine to get the recommendations, but in real life this engine would be deployed as a separate artifact and would be accessed through a RESTful service.
